text: The 1924 South Carolina Gamecocks football team represented the University of South Carolina during the 1924 Southern Conference football season. Led by head coach Sol Metzger, the Gamecocks finished with a record of 7-3.http://grfx.cstv.com/photos/schools/scar/sports/m-footbl/auto_pdf/2016-17/misc_non_event/16-fb- mg-sec-6.pdf The season was notable for its low scoring. ==Schedule== ==References== South Carolina Category:South Carolina Gamecocks football seasons South Carolina Game
title: 1924 South Carolina Gamecocks football team
